text: Bill Lee (born October 9, 1959)Lee Company – Leadership is an American businessman and politician. He is the 50th and current Governor of Tennessee. He was the Republican nominee for Governor of Tennessee in the 2018 election. Lee was the 7th Congressional District’s representative to the Tennessee Higher Education Commission. Lee had no active political positions while running for governor and was a cattle rancher. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Tennessee Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Businesspeople from Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Bill Lee (Tennessee politician)
